library.description: A simple library that makes it easy to generate DOM nodes from a JSON-like structure.
library.name: DomBuilder

library.description:
LMD - JavaScript Module-Assembler for building better web applications

Why LMD?

You can write your modules in any style: LMD, AMD, Node.js, your_own. LMD package is fully-zero-isolated from globals. Config inheritance: Easy to setup multiply builds. Flexible source: from 500bytes. Integrated code-coverage, source analytics tools, transparent localStorage cache.
library.name: LMD

library.description: Build content declaratively or with nested JSON-ML style arrays, supporting DOM Element or HTML output for use in browsers or Node.js.
library.name: DOM-Builder
